paper.title: Predicting stock returns with financial ratios: A new methodology incorporating machine learning techniques to beat the market
paper.abstract: This study proposes a methodology incorporating machine learning algorithms to predict stock returns and construct portfolios that beat the market. The performance evaluation is based on the statistical metrics as well as the return and Sharpe ratios of the portfolios. Additionally, a new performance evaluation metric, Safe-Side, is introduced to address the needs of conservative portfolio managers and investors. The results provide strong evidence that the machine learning algorithms can be used to predict the stock returns with approximately 86% classification accuracy. The proposed methodology also provides guidance for investors and portfolio managers for their portfolio selection problems.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用机器学习算法预测股票收益并构建投资组合，旨在帮助投资者和投资组合经理进行投资组合选择，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。
